statement.p: In the model \displaystyle{A}={198.1}{e}^{{{0.0467}{t}}} what is the percent increase or decrease?
Note all numbers are scientific measurements.

solution.p: The percent increase/decrease is calculated from \displaystyle{e}^{{0.0467}}\approx{1.0478076196377}. Because this is bigger than 1, this is a percent increase and the result is \displaystyle{1.0478076196377}-{1}={0.047807619637706}\approx{0.0478} and the percent is 4.78.
We round to 3 significant digits because the measurement (exponent) had 3 significant digits.
